name: LGBT+ Youth Summer Tech Camp
description: Free Summer Tech Camp for LGBT+ Youth and Allies - Program serves LGBT+ youth & allies (ages 14-19)! - This service is FREE - 2 week tech camp in San Francisco, led by LGBT+ youth Skills taught: - Build your own video game + create a social justice app for queer youth! - Choose your track: Video Game Writing, Video Game Art Design, Game Development! - Team up with other LGBT+ youth to make an epic queer video game and queer social justice app for the queer youth movement! - Meet queer tech pros
fullDescription: Free Summer Tech Camp for LGBT+ Youth and Allies - Program serves LGBT+ youth & allies (ages 14-19)! - This service is FREE - 2 week tech camp in San Francisco, led by LGBT+ youth Skills taught: - Build your own video game + create a social justice app for queer youth! - Choose your track: Video Game Writing, Video Game Art Design, Game Development! - Team up with other LGBT+ youth to make an epic queer video game and queer social justice app for the queer youth movement! - Meet queer tech pros
whatTheyOffer: Free Summer Tech Camp for LGBT+ Youth and Allies - Program serves LGBT+ youth & allies (ages 14-19)! - This service is FREE - 2 week tech camp in San Francisco, led by LGBT+ youth Skills taught: - Build your own video game + create a social justice app for queer youth! - Choose your track: Video Game Writing, Video Game Art Design, Game Development! - Team up with other LGBT+ youth to make an epic queer video game and queer social justice app for the queer youth movement! - Meet queer tech pros
howToGetIt: Apply online and we'll follow up with camp details. For more info, contact sam@mavenyouth.org
agency: Maven Youth+LGBT+ Youth Summer Tech Camp
